description: Support to One UN Monitoring and Evaluation Framework and Development of the UN knowledge management agenda in Albania.

subproject.description: Projects aims the establishment and maintenance of a UN Albania common Framework for monitoring and evaluation (M&E) and Knowledge Management (KM).  This will be achieved through the use of technically sound results frameworks, improved data collection and management, and increase evaluative capacity.
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: Support to One UN M& E

title: Support to One UN M&E
